hypothesis_content.title: BTC 4-Hour Bollinger Band Squeeze Breakout with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC experiences a Bollinger Band squeeze (BB width < 0.5% of price) on the 4-hour chart during NEUTRAL regimes, a breakout above the upper band with volume > 150% of 20-period average will lead to a continuation move of at least 2.5% within the next 12 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Bollinger Band squeezes indicate compression of volatility, which often precedes explosive moves. During NEUTRAL regimes, these breakouts are less likely to be false signals compared to STRESS regimes. Volume confirmation filters out weak breakouts.
entry_conditions: BTC 4H Bollinger Band width (20,2) < 0.5% of current price
Price closes above upper Bollinger Band
Volume on breakout candle > 150% of 20-period average volume

exit_conditions.stop_loss: 1.5% below entry price OR close back inside Bollinger Bands
exit_conditions.time_exit: 12 hours after entry if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 55% of such setups result in immediate rejection (price returns inside bands within 2 candles) or fail to reach 2.5% target within 12 hours.
